nodes.body: { üßë‚Äçüíª Dev Updates } Plunderer's Run Devlogs are now live on Itch! [Check them out here!](https://blusurfacemedia.itch.io/plunderers-run)

{!header} December was a creative and productive month for STLGameDev! Even with the busy end of the year, members continued to share exciting submissions and updates across their projects. From new mechanics and prototypes to art, audio, and polish, this RoundUp highlights the progress our developers made throughout the month.
‚≠ê Did you know we're active on social media? Pick your favorite site to follow us on:
‚Ä¢ [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/stlgamedev/) ‚Ä¢ [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/stlgame.dev) ‚Ä¢ [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@stlgame-dev) ‚Ä¢ [Twitter](https://x.com/stlgamedev) ‚Ä¢ [Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/) ‚Ä¢
{ üéº Releases } _Lazarus D. Richardson_ made [N%](https://lazarusrichardson.bandcamp.com/track/n) for Dorian's music jam

{ üì¢ News } Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 absolutely [sweeps the game awards](https://www.npr.org/2025/12/12/nx-s1-5640839/game-awards-2025-winners-clair-obscur-expedition-33), but [loses the Indie Game of the Year Award to Blue Prince due to AI](https://www.pcmag.com/news/clair-obscur-expedition-33-stripped-of-a-game-of-the-year-award-because)
{ üì¢ News } [Naughty Dog has reportedly mandated crunch for Intergalactic](https://www.thegamer.com/naughty-dog-crunch-internal-intergalactic-the-heretic-prophet-demo/)

{ üì¢ News } [Rockstar claims recent firings were for leaking confidential game information, union fires back](https://hitmarker.net/news/rockstar-claims-recent-firings-were-for-leaking-confidential-game-information-union-fires-back-1597277)

{ üéÆ Releases } _Garry Alcorn_ released [ERL](https://asoftmedia.itch.io/erl), a fast-paced endless running game where your goal is to make the number go up! Collect multipliers and bonuses through 8 stages of a dynamic multisided platform. [Check out his devlogs on his throwback site](https://garryalcorn.com/)!

{ üßë‚Äçüíª Dev Updates } _Tony Woljnar_ continued working on the Toxic Tavern level for Dribble 2, with some [countertop platforms & a cool jukebox](https://bsky.app/profile/tonywojnar.bsky.social/post/3m7dhcu4l5s2l), [added spike shockwaves on certain enemies](https://bsky.app/profile/tonywojnar.bsky.social/post/3m7vavwniws2d), and experimented with [adding mugs that pop chemicals into the air](https://bsky.app/profile/tonywojnar.bsky.social/post/3magstpup7s25).

{ üïπÔ∏è Game Jam Releases } _Axol Studio_ released [Echoes of the Infinite Recursor](https://axolstudio.itch.io/echoes-of-the-infinite-recursor), a game made in 1-week for the [Yogscast Games - Jingle Game Jam 2025](https://itch.io/jam/jinglegamejam2025), with the theme "If you can't beat them, join them". An ancient evil is waking from it's slumber - you must try to stop it, but keep in mind, if you fail, you will fight on your enemy's behalf... _Lazarus D. Richardson_ created an accompanying [soundtrack with six tracks](https://lazarusrichardson.bandcamp.com/album/echoes-of-the-infinite-recursor).

{ üïπÔ∏è Game Jam Releases } [Planet Poachers](https://danidomain.itch.io/planet-poachers) was made in two weeks as part of the Webster University Fall 2025 Intro to Unreal Engine class. You're a smuggler and poacher of exotic alien eggs. Repair your ship and find the eggs if you want to make it out alive!

{ üïπÔ∏è Game Jam Releases } [Loaner's Pub](https://mirid7.itch.io/loaners-pub) was made in two weeks as part of the Webster University Fall 2025 Intro to Unreal Engine class. After several loans taken out to create your own business(and several failed attempts), a group of loan sharks have gotten angry at you. In one final ditch effort, you take out yet another loan with confidence that this business will succeed. You've opened up a bar and need to make enough money to pay your rent on time. If you don't, those loan sharks might seek payment another way...

{ üïπÔ∏è Game Jam Releases } [Slimber](https://whyinds.itch.io/slimber) was made in two weeks as part of the Webster University Fall 2025 Intro to Unreal Engine class. Talk to townsfolk and complete their quests. Solve the issues of the town of Slimber, and see how the town unfolds. Who knows what might happen?

{ üßë‚Äçüíª Dev Updates } _Colorgrave_ announced their latest game coming soon: [Curse Chapter: Dawnthief](https://store.steampowered.com/app/4228390/Curse_Chapter_Dawnthief/)! Plunder all the treasure worth taking from the exotic wilderness with your band of rogues. Jump, kick and sling your chain mace to smash and climb your way through any obstacle. Face off against beasts and hopeful heroes that rise up to stop you.

{ üßë‚Äçüíª Dev Updates } _Butterscotch Shenanigans'_ newest game, How Many Dudes? - an autobattler roguelike that seeks to answer one of humanity's oldest questions - How many dudes does it take? - has a [demo out now](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3934270/How_Many_Dudes/)!
{ üìö Resources } [The Brutal Truth About Pricing Your Art](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_o5mE8o39bM) - the most comprehensive advice online on pricing illustration artwork
{ üì¢ News } Lucia Robbins won big for [Draco vs Decoy](https://www.instagram.com/p/DRadkm3kW9b/?img_index=1) at the Big Picture Peoria Film Festival!

{ üì¢ News } James C. Kane's ‚ÄòThe Nanauts‚Äô won a $30,000 prize for [Best Immersive Web Experience](https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7409377607064039424/) in the [Meta](https://www.linkedin.com/company/meta/) Start Developer Competition! He created it solo in 3 weeks with the [Immersive Web SDK](https://iwsdk.dev/).

events.title: STLGameDev New Year's Eve Party Mixer w/STLVGM!
events.description:
Ring in the New Year with creativity, community, and a little friendly competition! STLGameDev and STLVGM are teaming up for a special New Year‚Äôs Eve Mixer at Dirty 20 starting at 8:00 PM.
Whether you make games, make music, or just love the scene, come hang out, network, and celebrate with fellow developers and audio artists from around St. Louis. We‚Äôll have old-school multiplayer Mario Kart set up, so bring your best drifting skills and get ready to battle it out retro-style.
Let‚Äôs kick off the new year with pixels, playlists, and plenty of power-ups!
¬†
For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see:¬†https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/312397463/
events.location: Dirty 20 Bar, 14051 Manchester Rd, Ballwin, MO 63011, USA

events.title: Global Game Jam 2026
events.description:
We are excited to announce Global Game Jam 2026! Come team up with local creators and make a game over the weekend! This event is open to ALL (even remote friends).¬† Students from any campus are welcome!

Online and In-Person participants are both welcome.¬† We will be using our community-run Discord server to handle announcements and online participation.¬† Join here!¬†

Registration for Global Game Jam is now open!
events.location: Millennium Student Center, 17 Arnold B Grobman Dr, St. Louis, MO 63121, USA
